definition: to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
biography/historical narrative/commentaries/relay station
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: The legacy of their disobedience is passed down to every generation.
sentences.chinese: 他们的忤逆一代代传承下来。

sentences.english: Entire design embodies the culture Smriti but the originality is unconventional.
sentences.chinese: 整个设计表现文化地传承而新奇别致。

sentences.english: Hereby, the learners of Guzheng should make great efforts to push forward the art of Guzheng music.
sentences.chinese: 筝乐艺术在习筝人数的不断扩增中得到传承和发展。

sentences.english: In Menzoberranzan, families were traced solely through the mother.
sentences.chinese: 在魔索布莱，家族仅仅通过母系传承。

sentences.english: Section V, inheriting, development and prospect of Inner Mongolia-Han melody.
sentences.chinese: 蒙汉调的传承发展与展望。

sentences.english: The inheritor is the key of traditional Wushu heritage, and to protect the inheritor is an important means to protect traditional Wushu.
sentences.chinese: 传承人是传统武术传承过程中的关键环节。

sentences.english: The inheritor is the key of traditional Wushu heritage, and to protect the inheritor is an important means to protect traditional Wushu.
sentences.chinese: 传承人是传统武术传承过程中的关键环节。

sentences.english: Private entrepreneur intergenerational succession is one of the livelihood problems.
sentences.chinese: 民营企业家的代际传承是一大民生问题。

sentences.english: This effective inheritance education of the birth consciousness in Zhan Li is a quite typical and successful instance.
sentences.chinese: 占里生育自觉的有效传承就是一个极为典型的范例。

sentences.english: Wu asked relevant departments to attach great significance to the research and inheritance of this ethnic culture.
sentences.chinese: 武吉海要求，高度重视巴代文化研究与传承。

sentences.english: The Giver went to the wall speaker and clicked the switch to ON.
sentences.chinese: 记忆传承者走到墙上的喇叭那里把开关切到开的位置。

sentences.english: This point of Jia Yi has a unique historical resource.
sentences.chinese: 贾谊这种思想有其独特的思想传承。

sentences.english: He belongs to posterity as the instructor of future generations in the principles of liberty and freedom.
sentences.chinese: 他属于作为下一代人的自由理念的教育者的传承人。

sentences.english: In the ML-descended functional languages, functions have type signatures.
sentences.chinese: 传承自ML的函数语言中，函数是类型签名。

sentences.english: "Call me The Giver, " he told Jonas.
sentences.chinese: “叫我记忆传承者”他告诉乔纳斯。

sentences.english: Old people pass down tradition to the younger generation.
sentences.chinese: 老年人把传统传承给下一辈。

definition: passed on from generation to generation (idiom); to hand down
lit. the flame of a burning piece of firewood passes on to the rest (idiom)/fig. (of knowledge, skill etc) to be passed on from teachers to students, one generation to another
passed on from generation to generation (idiom); to hand down
to develop/to make full use of

to teach/to impart/a disciple/descendant
cultural tradition
skill/art

definition: from generation to generation/generation after generation
to inherit/to succeed to (the throne etc)/to carry on (a tradition etc)
gem/(fig.) rare and valuable item/gem/treasure
